verses.verse: <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to the <S%H5850>crown<s%> of <S%H1348>pride<s%> of the <S%H7910>drunkards<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and to the <S%H5034>fading<s%> <S%H6731>flower<s%> of his <S%H6643>glorious<s%> <S%H8597>beauty,<s%> which is on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H8081>fertile<s%> <S%H1516>valley<s%> of those who are <S%H1986>overcome<s%> with <S%H3196>wine!<s%>

<S%H136>Behold,<s%> the Lord has a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> and strong <S%H533>one.<s%> Like a <S%H2230>storm<s%> of <S%H1259>hail,<s%> a <S%H6986>destroying<s%> <S%H8178>storm,<s%> and like a <S%H2230>storm<s%> of <S%H3524>mighty<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7857>overflowing,<s%> he will cast them <S%H3240>down<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%> with his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
The <S%H5850>crown<s%> of <S%H1348>pride<s%> of the <S%H7910>drunkards<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> will be <S%H7429>trodden<s%> under <S%H7272>foot.<s%>

The <S%H5034>fading<s%> <S%H6733>flower<s%> of his <S%H6643>glorious<s%> <S%H8597>beauty,<s%> which is on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H8081>fertile<s%> <S%H1516>valley,<s%> shall be like the <S%H1061>first-ripe<s%> fig before the <S%H7019>summer;<s%> which someone <S%H3709>picks<s%> and <S%H1104>eats<s%> as <S%H7200>soon<s%> as he sees <S%H7200>it.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> will become a <S%H5850>crown<s%> of <S%H6643>glory,<s%> and a <S%H6843>diadem<s%> of <S%H8597>beauty,<s%> to the <S%H7605>residue<s%> of his <S%H5971>people;<s%>

and a <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H4941>justice<s%> to him who <S%H3427>sits<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> and <S%H1369>strength<s%> to those who <S%H7725>turn<s%> back the <S%H4421>battle<s%> at the <S%H8179>gate.<s%>

<S%H428>They<s%> also <S%H7686>reel<s%> with <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and <S%H8582>stagger<s%> with strong <S%H7941>drink.<s%> The <S%H3548>priest<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H7686>reel<s%> with strong <S%H7941>drink.<s%> They are swallowed <S%H1104>up<s%> <S%H4480>by<s%> <S%H3196>wine.<s%> They <S%H8582>stagger<s%> with strong <S%H7941>drink.<s%> They <S%H7686>err<s%> in <S%H7203>vision.<s%> They <S%H6328>stumble<s%> in <S%H6417>judgment.<s%>
For all <S%H7979>tables<s%> are completely <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H4725>filthy<s%> <S%H6892>vomit<s%> and <S%H6675>filthiness.<s%>

Whom will he <S%H3384>teach<s%> <S%H1844>knowledge?<s%> To whom will he <S%H995>explain<s%> the <S%H8052>message?<s%> Those who are <S%H1580>weaned<s%> from the <S%H2461>milk,<s%> and <S%H6267>drawn<s%> from the <S%H7699>breasts?<s%>

For it is <S%H6673>precept<s%> on <S%H6673>precept,<s%> <S%H6673>precept<s%> on <S%H6673>precept;<s%> <S%H6957>line<s%> on <S%H6957>line,<s%> <S%H6957>line<s%> on <S%H6957>line;<s%> here a <S%H2191>little,<s%> there a <S%H2191>little.<s%>
But he will <S%H1696>speak<s%> to this <S%H5971>nation<s%> with <S%H3934>stammering<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> and in <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H3956>language;<s%>

to whom he <S%H559>said,<s%> "This is the <S%H5117>resting<s%> <S%H4496>place.<s%> Give rest to <S%H5889>weary;<s%>" <S%H4774>and<s%> "This is the refreshing;" yet they <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H8085>hear.<s%>

Therefore the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will be to them <S%H6673>precept<s%> on <S%H6673>precept,<s%> <S%H6673>precept<s%> on <S%H6673>precept;<s%> <S%H6957>line<s%> on <S%H6957>line,<s%> <S%H6957>line<s%> on <S%H6957>line;<s%> here a <S%H2191>little,<s%> there a <S%H2191>little;<s%> that they may <S%H3212>go,<s%> <S%H3782>fall<s%> <S%H268>backward,<s%> be <S%H7665>broken,<s%> be <S%H3369>snared,<s%> and be <S%H3920>taken.<s%>
Therefore <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H582>you<s%> <S%H3944>scoffers,<s%> that <S%H4910>rule<s%> this <S%H582>people<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%>

"Because you have <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3772><s%> 'We have made a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H4194>death,<s%> and with <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> are <S%H6213>we<s%> in <S%H2374>agreement.<s%> When the <S%H7857>overflowing<s%> <S%H7752>scourge<s%> passes <S%H5674>through,<s%> it <S%H935>won't<s%> come to <S%H7760>us;<s%> for we have made <S%H3577>lies<s%> our <S%H4268>refuge,<s%> and we have <S%H5641>hidden<s%> ourselves under <S%H8267>falsehood.<s%>'"

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H3245>"Behold,<s%> I lay in <S%H6726>Zion<s%> for a foundation a <S%H68>stone,<s%> a <S%H976>tried<s%> <S%H68>stone,<s%> a <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H6438>cornerstone<s%> of a <S%H3245>sure<s%> <S%H4143>foundation.<s%> He who <S%H539>believes<s%> shall not act <S%H2363>hastily.<s%>

I will <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> the measuring <S%H6957>line,<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> the <S%H4949>plumb<s%> <S%H1259>line.<s%> The hail will sweep <S%H3261>away<s%> the <S%H4268>refuge<s%> of <S%H3577>lies,<s%> and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> will <S%H7857>overflow<s%> the hiding <S%H5643>place.<s%>

Your <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H4194>death<s%> shall be <S%H3722>annulled,<s%> and your <S%H2380>agreement<s%> with <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> shall not <S%H6965>stand.<s%> When the <S%H7857>overflowing<s%> <S%H7752>scourge<s%> passes <S%H5674>through,<s%> then you will be trampled down by <S%H4823>it.<s%>

As <S%H1767>often<s%> as it passes <S%H5674>through,<s%> it will <S%H3947>seize<s%> <S%H1242>you;<s%> for morning by <S%H1242>morning<s%> it will pass <S%H5674>through,<s%> by <S%H3117>day<s%> and by <S%H3915>night;<s%> and it will be nothing but <S%H2113>terror<s%> to <S%H995>understand<s%> the <S%H8052>message.<s%>"
For the <S%H4702>bed<s%> is too <S%H7114>short<s%> to <S%H8311>stretch<s%> out <S%H4541>on,<s%> and the blanket is too <S%H6887>narrow<s%> to wrap oneself <S%H3664>in.<s%>

For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will rise <S%H6965>up<s%> as on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6559>Perazim.<s%> He will be <S%H7264>angry<s%> as in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H1391>Gibeon;<s%> that he may <S%H6213>do<s%> his <S%H4639>work,<s%> his <S%H2114>unusual<s%> <S%H4639>work,<s%> and bring to <S%H5647>pass<s%> his <S%H5656>act,<s%> his <S%H5237>extraordinary<s%> <S%H5656>act.<s%>

Now therefore <S%H3887>don't<s%> be scoffers, lest your <S%H4147>bonds<s%> be made <S%H2388>strong;<s%> for I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H2782>decree<s%> of <S%H3617>destruction<s%> from the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> on the whole <S%H776>earth.<s%>
Give <S%H238>ear,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H6963>voice!<s%> <S%H7181>Listen,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H565>speech!<s%>
Does he who <S%H2790>plows<s%> to <S%H2232>sow<s%> <S%H2790>plow<s%> <S%H3117>continually?<s%> Does he keep <S%H6605>turning<s%> the <S%H127>soil<s%> and breaking the <S%H7702>clods?<s%>

When he has <S%H7737>leveled<s%> its <S%H6440>surface,<s%> <S%H6327>doesn't<s%> he plant the <S%H7100>dill,<s%> and <S%H2236>scatter<s%> the <S%H3646>cumin<s%> <S%H7760>seed,<s%> and put in the <S%H2406>wheat<s%> in <S%H7795>rows,<s%> the <S%H8184>barley<s%> in the <S%H5567>appointed<s%> <S%H3698>place,<s%> and the spelt in its <S%H1367>place?<s%>
For his <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3256>instructs<s%> him in right <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> and teaches <S%H3384>him.<s%>

For the <S%H7100>dill<s%> are not <S%H1758>threshed<s%> with a sharp <S%H2742>instrument,<s%> neither is a <S%H5699>cart<s%> <S%H212>wheel<s%> turned <S%H5437>over<s%> the <S%H3646>cumin;<s%> but the <S%H7100>dill<s%> is beaten <S%H2251>out<s%> with a <S%H4294>stick,<s%> and the <S%H3646>cumin<s%> with a <S%H7626>rod.<s%>

<S%H3899>Bread<s%> flour must be <S%H1854>ground;<s%> so he will not <S%H5331>always<s%> be <S%H156>threshing<s%> <S%H1536>it.<s%> Although he drives the wheel of his threshing <S%H5699>cart<s%> <S%H2000>over<s%> <S%H6571>it,<s%> his horses <S%H1854>don't<s%> grind it.
This also comes <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> who is <S%H6381>wonderful<s%> in <S%H6098>counsel,<s%> and <S%H1431>excellent<s%> in <S%H8454>wisdom.<s%>
